channel.title: Castle Wars Wildy Zone help
channel.description:
I've just finished to code my Castle Wars in my 317. It works perfectly but I can't attack players in it. How can I make my attack button working in my Castle Wars ? Do I need to get the coords (The coords of my Castle Wars interface) and make a wildy zone with a skull like wild ? I'm confused because I never played RS in Castle Wars so I ask you guy's what should I do ? Also, if anyone want to give me coords for it or a code of it, it would be cool.
Thanks.

item.title: Castle Wars Wildy Zone help
